docstring.long_description:
This example uses the Crank-Nicolson Method to solve the 1D Schrodinger equation.

Further reading:
http://staff.ustc.edu.cn/~zqj/posts/Numerical_TDSE/
docstring.short_description: Approximate the behaviour of a 1D Gaussian wavepacket in an infinite-well potential box.

parameters.name: L_box
parameters.description: The width of the box in Bohr lengths.

parameters.name: center
parameters.description: The center of the initial wavepacket.

parameters.name: momentum
parameters.description: The momentum of the initial wavepacket.

parameters.name: sigma
parameters.description: The width of the initial wavepacket.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: Time steps in atomic units, 1 a.u. = 24.188 as.
